text: Evan Samuel Williams (15 July 1943 â€“ 20 February 2025) was a Scottish footballer. He played as a goalkeeper for Third Lanark, Wolverhampton Wanderers, Aston Villa, Celtic, Clyde and Stranraer. Williams died on 20 February 2025, at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Scottish footballers Category:Scottish football managers
title: Evan Williams (footballer)
